author: TinyHippo
title: Two good, one bad.
review:
As the title of this review suggests, two of the models - the crane and the 4x4 - are lots of fun, the combine harvester is less exciting. A good selection of pieces equals a good bang for your buck. The main two designs are sturdy and there are plenty of possibilities.

Certainly above average, if not stunning.

author: chrisdog121411
title: A++++ and 5/5
review:
I just got this set today at a great price $3.49!! It was a fun build, I really liked the main model. Now lets move on to the review.



     Main model: I know this design is based off a type of jeep. I like how it has two horn parts on the top. The hood can open by using one hinged plat, and one clip. It also has two head lights and two back lights. this is one awesome model.


Telescope handler : based off of the 2008 technic series. simple to build. Uses 98% of parts. the cool part is that the the arm goes up and down. 



Tractor: I'm not going to tell about it yet maybe some other day.





over all 5.9/5

author: stevosowl
title: A nice 3 in 1 creator set for a few UK pounds
review:
Received in the stocking for xmas '09 

A nice 3 in 1 creator set for a few UK pounds

the build was quick and simple as you would expect and creates a nice 4x4 jeep. The opening bonnet is a nice detail as are the horns on the roof.

bigger and better than the creator land-rover clone but not in the same league as the large creator vehicles

author: frycook49
title: Great Value!
review: I got this in my stocking in 2009, and I was amazed at how much use I got out of it. I loved the fact that it had three different things to build, and I found that the  of  road vehicle   was the best, and that the tractor was probably my least favourite. The pieces are nice, but nothing really special (nothing too rare). It is fun to put mini figure on it, and ride it. The set is great value for money/stocking filler, I loved it!

author: Firox_5000
title: The good ,the very good and the ugly
review:
This set is another great addition to the creator mini series ,it's good ,it's fun and it's cheap. The set has three models.

 

The 4x4 is very neat and has very good detail on the front  and back. The front opens and it is very sturdy.

 

The Telehandler is also very nice and the lifting arm is very good to play with. The detail is very nice.

 

The tractor isn't bad it's not the best model made but at least you get another model to play with when the telehandler and 4x4 get boring.

 

Quite a lot of playability and a great set. I recomend you buy it even though it's not as good value now that it is Â£1 more.

author: modena
title: Wait until you have a minifig, but still nice.
review:
This is a great set, if you have a minifig to ride on it. Whatever model you build (except the tractor) is very easy and interesting to play with.

Pros:

  • Nice parts!
  • Good colours!
  • Nice models!
  • Detail!
  • Hinging parts!
  • Comes in a portable box.

Cons:

  • Small set.
  • Easy to build.

Overall:

I think this was a good set, the horns can actually be used as weapons, and the minifig always has somewhere to sit on. 
The set comes in a nice plastic box, which is perfect to have when you are on the move.

Overall, this set will be pretty satisfying to you if you have a minifig.
